response.overview: Actor Doug Jones has often been referred to as the Boris Karloff of our time. This in depth feature length documentary seeks out to find how this actor/mime went on to become one of Hollywood's most sought after actors when it comes to creating fantastic creatures in full body make-up/costumes. From his early start in projects like Buffy The Vampire Slayer to major motion pictures like Hellboy and Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer to Oscar winning and nominated films like Pan's Labyrinth and The Shape Of Water we set out to find out more about the life and career of a new Hollywood legend.
response.title: Get Me Doug Jones
